description.english: You have no idea what you are getting yourself into.
Bring your friend back in time!
Search engine is my best friend.
What a weird place to fight.
Time travel and save your friend.
You are too hot to handle.
I like where this is going.
Can you help me find my way?
Some people do grow on trees.
You were too late for the delivery.
It's time for the final showdown!
Survived the future in one piece.
Opened Pure Chest with 10 or more Good Karma.
Opened Pure Chest with 10 or more Bad Karma.
Opened Pure Chest with 10 or more Neutral Karma.
Now, this is what I call a treasure.
I'm not going to summon a God.
Is this the fate of a Time Mage?
The dark side of a Time Mage.
Be glad that you got companions like these.
Your efforts are not in vain.
The end of the Ice Age.
Qual, the true hero of the world.
